name: Business Object MT PlugIn Framework
short_description:
1. Generic Middle Tier provides plug and play of Business Objects.
2. No coding of WCF interfaces req.
3. GUI builder tool from Business Object libraries.
4. Linq reflection library to avoid having to actually write any Linq.
